SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
Event
Event is an abstract class that all events should inherit from, to be run inside the simulator loop.
EventClosing
EventClosing is an event that causes the shop to close for the day.
EventQueue
A class that keeps track of the upcoming events
EventStart
EventStart is the event that will be run at the start of simulation.
ExponentialRandomStream
Random Number Generator with uniform distribution.
Optimize
Class to find optimal amount of free checkout counters for a simulated shop.
RunSim
Class to run a simulation of a shop.
ShopState
ShopState extends the public State class and contains parameters required to simulate a shop.
ShopView
ShopView extends the public View class and prints out params, events and stats from simulating a shop using this package.
Simulator
A machine that picks out events and runs them, one at a time.
StartSim
The first event to be run by the simulator.
State
A class which purpose is to keep track of the state of the simulation, with variables like current time State is Observable
StopSim
The last event to be run by the simulator.
UniformRandomStream
Random Number Generator with uniform distribution.
View
A view which observes state and runs a function when the state was updated.
